name: Mario
coverLetter: Very down to earth person , easy to get along with. Have a few months experience of trimming and taking care of the plants. Not a stranger to 10 to 12 work days. I have experience Watering/nutrients & drying the buds. Familar with Traditional scissor trimming & and also have experience working the "twister" trimming machine. Always open to learning new things. Available To work Asap
